title: Form Field Validator
description: Implement a form validation function that validates multiple form fields according to specified rules. The validator should support required fields, min/max length, pattern matching, and email validation.
requirements: Takes two parameters: form data object and validation rules object
Returns { isValid: boolean, fieldErrors: Record<string, string[]> }
Support 'required' rule (field must not be empty)
Collect all errors per field (multiple rules can fail)
Field with no errors should not appear in fieldErrors
Return isValid: false if any field has errors

few_shot_examples.prompt: Implement a function that checks if a string matches a regex pattern.
Implement a function that checks if a string is a valid email.
Implement a function that validates string length constraints.
